description: Variation of condition 67 (Approved Plans) of planning permission P/2008/0156 dated 23/11/2009 for the demolition of existing buildings (part of the stable block, the Town Hall Annexe, nos. 2-12 New Broadway, existing Parish Hall and boundary wall to west and south of the church forecourt/carpark), and construction of 7 new buildings (ranging from 2 storeys to 14 storeys plus enclosed rooftop access) with retention of former fire station and part stable block, to provide maximum of 698 residential units; 9,040sqm retail (Use Class A1/A3), 139sqm office (Use Class B1), 920sqm Health Spa (Use Class D2) and 325sqm community use (Use Class D1), with basement car parking, associated public realm and landscaping and vehicular access off Longfield Avenue and pedestrian accesses from Longfield Avenue, Springbridge Road and New Broadway (as amended by planning permission PP/2013/5670 dated 14/02/2014) for landscape improvements to the public square including space for public art, relocation of community facility from first floor of Block H, extension of restaurant/cafT on ground floor of Block H to first floor and inclusion of residential accommodation for caretaker of church,, alteration to materials of Block H and alterations to the height, footprint and materials of Block G to provide a total net increased floorspace of 175.8sqm
decision_conditions: Variation of condition 67: Approved Plans  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: P10_F_ Lower Basement, P11_D_Upper Basement, P12 Rev G, P13 Rev F, P14 Rev E, P15 Rev E, P16 Rev E, P17 Rev E, P18 Rev G, P19 Rev F, P20 Rev E, P21_E_Ninth Floor, P22_E_Tenth Floor, P23_D_Eleventh Floor, P24_D_Twelfth Floor, P25_D_Thirteenth Floor, P26_D_Roof Plan, P28_A_Block 'I' Plans, P30_D_Application Site (Outline), P31_B_Application Site (Demolition), P35_Lower Basement Tracking, P36_ Upper Basement Tracking, P37_A_Existing Church Wall, P38_A_proposed Church Wall, P39_B_Proposed Town Square, P41_C_Block A, P42_A_Block B, P43_A_Block C, P44_A_Block D, P45_B_Block E, P46 Revison D, P47_C_Block H, P48_Block I, P49_C_North-South Composite Elevation, P50_B_Site Sections, P51_B_Gordon Road Sections, P52_A_Long North Elevation, P53_Demolition Elevations, P55_D_Sections showing Overlooking, P59_A_CGI View Position Map, P61_C_Ramp & Service Yard Sections, P83_C_ Ground Floor Servicing Strategy, P84_A_ Lower Basement Servicing Strategy, P85_C_Ground Floor Public Amenity Areas, P86_D_Roof Plan Residential Amenity Areas, 2078-010-001 Rev D, D0045_007_G_ Landscape Masterplan Market Street, D0045_008_G_ Landscape Masterplan Victoria Square, 2078-040-001 Revision A, 2078-040-002 Rev A, 2078-010-002_Revision B, D0045_012_G_ Landscape Masterplan - Heritage Court, D0045_013_ Courtyard 1 details, D0045_014_Courtyard 2 details, D0045_015_A_ Courtyard 3 details, D0045_016_Courtyard 4-5 details, D0045_017_Courtyard 6-7 details, D0045_018_C_Landscape Masterplan (received 21/01/2008) BLK_CDE_PLN_00, BLK_CDE_PLN_01, BLK_CDE_PLN_02, BLK_CDE_PLN_03, BLK_CDE_PLN_04, BLK_CDE_PLN_05, BLK_CDE_PLN_06, BLK_CDE_PLN_07, BLK_CDE_PLN_08, BLK_CDE_PLN_09, BLK_CDE_PLN_10, BLK_CDE_PLN_13, BLK_CDE_PLN_14, BLK_D_ELE_01, BLK_E_ELE_01_Revised Elevation, BLK_CDE_PLN_11 Rev A,  BLK_CDE_PLN_12 Rev A, BLK_C_ELE_01 Rev B (received 16/03/2012) BM 25901-A-02-000-P30 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P31 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P32 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P33 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P34 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P35 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P36 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P37 Rev A, BM 25901-A-02-000-P38 Rev A, BM 28028-A-Block F1-05-105 (received 21/11/2012) BM 28028-A-Block F1-05-205 Rev D, BM 28028-A-Block F1-05-304 Rev D, BM 28028-A-03-000 (2) (received 11/01/2013) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.   Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
site_number: The Church of Christ The Saviour
